    • Method Detail

      • verifyKey

        public abstract boolean verifyKey​(int cardProtocol,
                                  int blockNo,
                                  byte[] serial,
                                  byte[] key)
        Verify the Key of the given partition

        Regardless of whether the verification fails or succeeds, the partition where the previous card was opened will be closed.

        Parameters:
        cardProtocol - PICCCardConstants.PROTOCOL_RFCARD_TYPE_A PICCCardConstants.PROTOCOL_RFCARD_TYPE_B
        blockNo - Block number
        serial - CARD SERIAL NUMBER
        key - A 6-byte key.
        Returns:
        true Success，false Fail.

      • getProtocol

        public abstract int getProtocol()
        Returns a constant that represents the current card slot and card communication protocol.

        This method is a synchronous method. When a card exists in the card slot and is successfully opened, the card object can be read at any time. PICCCardConstants.PROTOCOL_RFCARD_TYPE_A PICCCardConstants.PROTOCOL_RFCARD_TYPE_B

        Returns:
        Constant for card communication protocol

        public abstract int getCardStatus()
        Returns the status of the card operation result object. CardConstants
        Returns:
        card status
